name: 吳建文
objective: This course is to introduce techniques and theories for data management. Topics include: 1. Introduction 2. Structural Query Langugage 3. Relational Model and Normalization 4. Database Design 5. Entity-Relationship Model 6. Managing Multiuser Databases 7. Managing Databases with MySQL 8. Web Server Concepts 9. XML 10. Database Processing for Business Intelligence Systems.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Structural Query Langugage, Relational Model and Normalization 
Week 3: Database Design and Entity-Relationship Model 
Week 4~5: Managing Multiuser Databases 
Week 6~9: Managing Databases with MySQL 
Week 10~11: Web Server Concepts 
Week 12~13: XML
Week 14~16: Database Processing for Business Intelligence Systems
Week 17~18: Project
materials:
David M. Kroenke and David J. Auer
Database Processing: Fundamentals, Design, and Implementation
11th Edition
Pearson
